音乐笔记 3 : 特立与协同

October 9, 2023

3.1  |  ANTONIO VIVALDI  (1711)

Concerto in si minore per 4 violini, violoncello e basso continuo, Op. 3 № 10 / RV 580


Monica Huggett / Catherine Mackintosh / Elizabeth Wilcock / John Holloway
[vn–vn–vn–vn]
Academy of Ancient Music
CHRISTOPHER HOGWOOD
(St George the Martyr, Holborn, London    1980-11)


3.2  |  JOHANN SEBASTIAN BACH  (1721)

Brandenburgische Konzerte : № 3 G-Dur, BWV 1048


Musica Antiqua Köln
REINHARD GOEBEL
(Deutschlandfunk Kammermusiksaal, Köln    1986-06)


3.3  |  MELCHIOR FRANCK  (1602)

Contrapuncti Compositi : № 17. ‘‘Ein feste Burg ist unser Gott’’


Vox Luminis
LIONEL MEUNIER
(Notre-Dame de la Nativité, Gedinne    2016-05)


3.4  |  TOMÁS LUIS DE VICTORIA  (1585)

Tenebrae Responsories : № 17. ‘‘Aestimatus sum’’


Lluís Vich Vocalis
(Capella de la Sapiència, València    2006-09)


3.5  |  CRISTOFANO MALVEZZI  (1589)

La Pellegrina : IV.ii. ‘‘Dal vago e bel sereno’’


Pygmalion
RAPHAËL PICHON
(Chapelle royale, Versailles    2016-11)


3.7  |  GIOVANNI GABRIELI  (1597)

Sacrae Symphoniae : № 28. Canzon per sonar primi toni, Ch. 170


La Pifarescha
(Convento di San Nicola, Almenno San Salvatore    2017-05)


3.8  |  THOMAS SIMPSON  (1617)

Opus : № 2. Intrada


Blechbläserensemble LUDWIG GÜTTLER
(Lukaskirche, Dresden    1986-01)


3.9  |  MICHAEL PRAETORIUS  (1612)

Terpsichore : № 268. Ballet


Praetorius Consort
CHRISTOPHER BALL
(Eden Studios, London    1976)


3.11  |  HENRY PURCELL  (1659–1695)

Sonata in D major for Trumpet and Strings, Z. 850


Niklas Eklund
Drottningholms Barockensemble
NILS-ERIK SPARF
(Petruskyrkan, Stocksund    1995-08)


3.13  |  GEORGE GERSHWIN  (1925)

Concerto in F : II. Andante con moto


André Previn / Uan Rasey
New York Philharmonic
АБРАМ КОСТЕЛЯНЕЦ
(American Legion Hall, Los Angeles    1960-03)


3.X  |  GEORGE FRIDERIC HANDEL  (1738)

Organ Concerto in B-flat major, Op. 4 № 6 / HWV 294


Ton Koopman
Amsterdam Baroque Orchestra
(Sint-Bartholomaeuskerk, Beek, Berg en Dal    1984)


3.X  |  LUDWIG VAN BEETHOVEN  (1795)

Klavierkonzert № 1 C-Dur, Op. 15 : I. Allegro con brio


Steven Lubin
Academy of Ancient Music
CHRISTOPHER HOGWOOD
(St Barnabas Church, London    1987-06)


3.X  |  WOLFGANG AMADEUS MOZART  (1786)

Klavierkonzert № 24 c-Moll, KV 491 : I. Allegro – II. Larghetto


Alfred Brendel
Academy of St Martin in the Fields
NEVILLE MARRINER
(Brent Town Hall, Wembley, London    1973-06)


3.X  |  ИГОРЬ СТРАВИНСКИЙ  (1938)

Concerto in E-flat major ‘‘Dumbarton Oaks’’


Orpheus Chamber Orchestra
(RCA Studio A, New York    1982-04)


3.X  |  FRANCIS POULENC  (1938)

Concerto pour orgue, cordes et timbales, FP 93


Marie-Claire Alain
Rotterdams Philharmonisch Orkest
JAMES CONLON
(De Doelen, Rotterdam    1984-10)


3.X  |  CHARLES IVES  (1908)

The Unanswered Question


Glenn Fischthal
San Francisco Symphony
MICHAEL TILSON THOMAS
(Davies Symphony Hall, San Francisco    1999-10)


3.X  |  ALBAN BERG  (1935)

Violinkonzert ‘‘Dem Andenken eines Engels’’


Arthur Grumiaux
Concertgebouworkest
ИГОРЬ МАРКЕВИЧ
(Concertgebouw, Amsterdam    1967-01)
